item.title: CVE-2023-6349|2024-05-27T11:26:58.207Z -- Chromium -- libvpx
item.description: A heap overflow vulnerability exists in libvpx -Â Encoding a frame that has larger dimensions than the originally configured size with VP9 may result in a heap overflow in libvpx. We recommend upgrading to version 1.13.1 or above
